Name: Galaxy's Edge
About the game: In Galaxy's Edge the Earth is being attacked by aliens, hence Humans has sent his battalion of spaceships to fight the aliens, but the battalion is destroyed and YOU are the only hope for Earth. Galaxy Edge is an indie Space Shooter style game created by Orb Studio. features Space Shooter Game Competitive game to play with friends Pixel art
